desc: A patented reusable boba bottle designed for your convenience. Spill-proof, built-in boba straw, hygienic, shatter-resistant, gentle on teeth, and easy to carry. Delivers an elevated drinking experience for eco-conscious boba tea lovers.

layout.text:
Spill-proof, built-in-straw, & shatter-resistant reusable boba bottle
designed for your convenience.
